name: Hexagun's Trial
description:
Hexagun's Trial is a space shooter that uses the MMORPG 'Holy Trinity' system, meaning that you have a party of allies: the Tank, the DPS , and you, the Healer.  

I created it based on my experience with MMOs, so...

Deal minimal damage as you rely on your braindead allies to take out your enemies! Heal them as they mindlessly run into enemy fire and refuse to get out of clearly telegraphed attacks! Make use of abilities not described to you that you just kinda have to guess what they do!

Remember, if you lose, it's all your fault!
